verbs.description: [ARG0: italy finance chief] [V: says] [ARG1: budget talks with the eu will continue despite disagreements the italian government will continue talking with the european commission over its spending plans to overcome their differences the country finance minister told cnbc on tuesday cnbc italy pierre moscovici executive tria finance minister rome european commission eu brussels european union giovanni tria willem marx]

italy finance chief says budget talks with the eu [V: will] continue despite disagreements the italian government will continue talking with the european commission over its spending plans to overcome their differences the country finance minister told cnbc on tuesday cnbc italy pierre moscovici executive tria finance minister rome european commission eu brussels european union giovanni tria willem marx
